translation.Message_0_Page_0: My name is Vilaskis Shalashev. I am engaged in an important matter - I follow the radio frequencies in the district and beyond. To say it honestly ... <pause> It was possible to catch a little, but most importantly - there is confirmation that many people from different countries survived, although for the time being I can only protect neighbors...
translation.Message_0_Page_1: If you get into trouble - call me on the radio, callsign BATTLEKOT, I'll try to help.
